member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure. Set tosizeof(STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR).

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.NameOffset
member.summary: Byte offset to the null-terminated ASCII string containing the resiliency properties Name. For devices with no Name property, this will be zero.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.NumberOfLogicalCopies
member.summary: Number of logical copies of data that are available.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.NumberOfPhysicalCopies
member.summary: Number of complete copies of data that are stored.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.PhysicalDiskRedundancy
member.summary: Number of disks that can fail without leading to data loss.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.NumberOfColumns
member.summary: Number of columns in the storage device.

member.name: STORAGE_DEVICE_RESILIENCY_DESCRIPTOR.Interleave
member.summary: Size of a stripe unit of the storage device, in bytes. This is also referred to as the stripe width or interleave of the storage device.
